00026 - (void)testInitPointObjectWithPositionVelocityAndAcceleration
00027 {
00028         NSArray *keys                   = [[NSArray alloc] initWithObjects: @"positionX",
00029                                                            @"positionY", @"positionZ", @"velocityX",
00030                                                            @"velocityY", @"velocityZ", @"accelerationX",
00031                                                            @"accelerationY", @"accelerationZ", nil];
00032         NSNumber *expValue              = [NSNumber numberWithDouble: 0.0];
00033 
00034         IMSRPointObject *point1 = [[IMSRPointObject alloc] initWithPositionX: [expValue doubleValue]
00035                                                                                                                            positionY: [expValue doubleValue]
00036                                                                                                                            positionZ: [expValue doubleValue]
00037                                                                                                                            velocityX: [expValue doubleValue]
00038                                                                                                                            velocityY: [expValue doubleValue]
00039                                                                                                                            velocityZ: [expValue doubleValue]
00040                                                                                                                    accelerationX: [expValue doubleValue]
00041                                                                                                                    accelerationY: [expValue doubleValue]
00042                                                                                                                    accelerationZ: [expValue doubleValue]];
00043         STAssertNotNil(point1, @"Could not construct point with all zero values");
00044         
00045         NSMutableDictionary *state1     = [point1 pointObject];
00046         STAssertNotNil(state1, @"state dictionary not available");
00047         
00048         NSNumber *count         = [NSNumber numberWithInt: [state1 count]];
00049         NSNumber *expCount      = [NSNumber numberWithInt: 9];
00050         STAssertTrue([count isEqualToNumber: expCount], 
00051                                  @"Incorrect number of values. Have %@, should be %@", count, expCount); 
00052         
00053         for (id key in state1)
00054         {
00055                 NSNumber *value = [state1 objectForKey: key];
00056                 STAssertTrue([value isEqualToNumber: expValue], 
00057                                          @"Number for %@ is %@. Should be %d", key, value, expValue);
00058         }
00059         
00060         NSArray *values = [[NSArray alloc] initWithObjects: expValue, expValue, expValue,
00061                                            expValue, expValue, expValue, [NSNumber numberWithDouble: 1.0],
00062                                            [NSNumber numberWithDouble: 2.0], [NSNumber numberWithDouble: -3.1], nil];
00063         
00064         NSDictionary    *expValues      = [NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjects: values forKeys: keys];
00065         
00066         IMSRPointObject *point2 = [[IMSRPointObject alloc] initWithPositionX: [[expValues objectForKey:@"positionX"] doubleValue]
00067                                                                                                                            positionY: [[expValues objectForKey:@"positionY"] doubleValue]
00068                                                                                                                            positionZ: [[expValues objectForKey:@"positionZ"] doubleValue]
00069                                                                                                                            velocityX: [[expValues objectForKey:@"velocityX"] doubleValue]
00070                                                                                                                            velocityY: [[expValues objectForKey:@"velocityY"] doubleValue]
00071                                                                                                                            velocityZ: [[expValues objectForKey:@"velocityZ"] doubleValue]
00072                                                                                                                    accelerationX: [[expValues objectForKey:@"accelerationX"] doubleValue]
00073                                                                                                                    accelerationY: [[expValues objectForKey:@"accelerationY"] doubleValue]
00074                                                                                                                    accelerationZ: [[expValues objectForKey:@"accelerationZ"] doubleValue]];
00075         STAssertNotNil(point2, @"Could not construct point with acceleration values only");
00076         
00077         NSMutableDictionary     *state2 = [point2 pointObject];
00078         STAssertNotNil(state2, @"State dictionary not available for point2");
00079         
00080         count   = [NSNumber numberWithInt: [state2 count]];
00081         STAssertTrue([count isEqualToNumber: expCount],
00082                                  @"Incorrect number of values. Have %@, should be %@", count, expCount);
00083         
00084         for (id key in state2)
00085         {
00086                 NSNumber *value         = [state2 objectForKey: key];
00087                 expValue                        = [expValues objectForKey: key];
00088                 STAssertTrue([value isEqualToNumber: expValue], 
00089                                          @"Number for %@ is %@. Should be %@", key, value, expValue);
00090         }
00091         
00092         [keys release];
00093         [values release];
00094         [point1 release];
00095         [point2 release];
00096 }

00098 - (void)testInitPointObjectWithPositionAndVelocity
00099 {
00100         NSArray *keys                   = [[NSArray alloc] initWithObjects: @"positionX",
00101                                                            @"positionY", @"positionZ", @"velocityX",
00102                                                            @"velocityY", @"velocityZ", nil];
00103         
00104         NSArray         *values = [[NSArray alloc] initWithObjects: [NSNumber numberWithDouble: 1.0],
00105                                                    [NSNumber numberWithDouble: -1.5], [NSNumber numberWithDouble: 0.7],
00106                                                    [NSNumber numberWithDouble: 3.0], [NSNumber numberWithDouble: -3.5],
00107                                                    [NSNumber numberWithDouble: 2.5], nil];
00108 
00109         NSDictionary    *expectedValues = [NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjects: values forKeys: keys];
00110         
00111         IMSRPointObject *point  = [[IMSRPointObject alloc] initWithPositionX: [[expectedValues objectForKey: @"positionX"] doubleValue]
00112                                                                                                                            positionY: [[expectedValues objectForKey: @"positionY"] doubleValue]
00113                                                                                                                            positionZ: [[expectedValues objectForKey: @"positionZ"] doubleValue]
00114                                                                                                                            velocityX: [[expectedValues objectForKey: @"velocityX"] doubleValue]
00115                                                                                                                            velocityY: [[expectedValues objectForKey: @"velocityY"] doubleValue]
00116                                                                                                                            velocityZ: [[expectedValues objectForKey: @"velocityZ"] doubleValue]];
00117         STAssertNotNil(point, @"Could not construct point");
00118         
00119         NSMutableDictionary     *state  = [point pointObject];
00120         STAssertNotNil(state, @"Could not get state from Object");
00121         
00122         NSNumber *expCount      = [NSNumber numberWithInt: 9];
00123         NSNumber *count         = [NSNumber numberWithInt: [state count]];
00124         STAssertTrue([count isEqualToNumber: expCount], 
00125                                  @"Body state contains %@ elements. Should be %@", count, expCount);
00126         NSNumber *defaultValue = [NSNumber numberWithDouble: 0.0];
00127         int i = 0;
00128         
00129         for (id key in state)
00130         {
00131                 NSNumber *value         = [state objectForKey: key];
00132                 NSNumber *expValue      = [expectedValues objectForKey: key];
00133                 STAssertNotNil(value, @"Value for key %@ is nil", key);
00134                 
00135                 if ([key isEqualToString: @"accelerationZ"] ||
00136                         [key isEqualToString: @"accelerationX"] || 
00137                         [key isEqualToString: @"accelerationY"])
00138                 {
00139                         STAssertTrue([value isEqualToNumber: defaultValue], 
00140                                                  @"%@ value is %@. Should be %@. Count: %d", key, value, defaultValue, i);
00141                 }
00142                 else
00143                 {
00144                         STAssertTrue([value isEqualToNumber: expValue],
00145                                                  @"%@ value is %@. Should be %@. Count: %d", key, value, expValue, i);
00146                 }
00147                 ++i;
00148         }
00149                                          
00150         [keys release];
00151         [values release];
00152         [point release];
00153 }

00155 - (void)testInitPointObjectWithPosition
00156 {
00157         NSArray         *keys   = [[NSArray alloc] initWithObjects: @"positionX",
00158                                                    @"positionY", @"positionZ", nil];
00159 
00160         NSArray         *values = [[NSArray alloc] initWithObjects: [NSNumber numberWithDouble: 1.0],
00161                                                    [NSNumber numberWithDouble: -1.5], [NSNumber numberWithDouble: 0.7], nil];   
00162 
00163         NSDictionary    *expectedValues = [NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjects: values forKeys: keys];
00164 
00165         IMSRPointObject *point  = [[IMSRPointObject alloc] initWithPositionX: [[expectedValues objectForKey: @"positionX"] doubleValue]
00166                                                                                                                           positionY: [[expectedValues objectForKey: @"positionY"] doubleValue]
00167                                                                                                                           positionZ: [[expectedValues objectForKey: @"positionZ"] doubleValue]];
00168         STAssertNotNil(point, @"Could not construct IMSRPointObject with position only initializer");
00169         
00170         NSMutableDictionary *state      = [point pointObject];
00171         STAssertNotNil(state, @"Could not get state from point");
00172         
00173         NSNumber *count         = [NSNumber numberWithInt: [state count]];
00174         NSNumber *expCount      = [NSNumber numberWithInt: 9];
00175         STAssertTrue([count isEqualToNumber: expCount],
00176                                  @"Dictionary has %@ elements. Should have %@", count, expCount);
00177         
00178         NSNumber *defaultValue  = [NSNumber numberWithDouble: 0.0];
00179         
00180         for (id key in state)
00181         {
00182                 NSNumber *value         = [state objectForKey: key];
00183                 NSNumber *expValue      = [expectedValues objectForKey: key];
00184                 
00185                 if ([key isEqualToString: @"positionX"] ||
00186                         [key isEqualToString: @"positionY"] ||
00187                         [key isEqualToString: @"positionZ"])
00188                 {
00189                         STAssertTrue([value isEqualToNumber: expValue],
00190                                                  @"Value for %@ is %@. Should be %@", key, value, expValue);
00191                 }
00192                 else
00193                 {
00194                         STAssertTrue([value isEqualToNumber: defaultValue],
00195                                                  @"Value for %@ is %@. Should be %@", key, value, defaultValue);
00196                 }
00197         }
00198         
00199         [keys release];
00200         [values release];
00201         [point release];
00202 }
00203 
00204 - (void)testInitPointObject
00205 {
00206         IMSRPointObject *point  = [[IMSRPointObject alloc] init];
00207         STAssertNotNil(point, @"Could not initialize point with default initializer");
00208         
00209         NSMutableDictionary *state = [point pointObject];
00210         STAssertNotNil(state, @"Could not get state for default initialized point object");
00211         
00212         NSNumber *count         = [NSNumber numberWithInt: [state count]];
00213         NSNumber *expCount      = [NSNumber numberWithInt: 9];
00214         STAssertTrue([count isEqualToNumber: expCount],
00215                                  @"Count is %@. Should be %@", count, expCount);
00216         
00217         NSNumber *defaultValue = [NSNumber numberWithDouble: 0.0];
00218         for (id key in state)
00219         {
00220                 NSNumber *value = [state objectForKey: key];
00221                 STAssertTrue([value isEqualToNumber: defaultValue],
00222                                          @"Value for %@ is %@. Should be %@", key, value, defaultValue);
00223         }
00224 }
00225 
00226 - (void)testUpdatePosition
00227 {
00228         double positionX        = 1.5;
00229         double positionY        = -2.5;
00230         double positionZ        = 34.7;
00231         
00232         STAssertNotNil(pointObj, @"Point not created");
00233         STAssertEquals([pointObj positionX], 0.0, @"PositionX is %f. Should be 0.0", [pointObj positionX]);
00234         STAssertEquals([pointObj positionY], 0.0, @"PositionY is %f. Should be 0.0", [pointObj positionY]);
00235         STAssertEquals([pointObj positionZ], 0.0, @"PositionZ is %f. Should be 0.0", [pointObj positionZ]);
00236 
00237         [pointObj updatePositionX: positionX positionY: positionY positionZ: positionZ];
00238         STAssertEquals([pointObj positionX], positionX, @"PositionX is %f. Should be %f", [pointObj positionX], positionX);
00239         STAssertEquals([pointObj positionY], positionY, @"PositionY is %f. Should be %f", [pointObj positionY], positionY);
00240         STAssertEquals([pointObj positionZ], positionZ, @"PositionZ is %f. Should be %f", [pointObj positionZ], positionZ);
00241 }
00242 
00243 - (void)testUpdateVelocity
00244 {
00245         double velocityX        = 0.3;
00246         double velocityY        = -0.2;
00247         double velocityZ        = -0.4;
00248         
00249         STAssertNotNil(pointObj, @"Point not created");
00250         STAssertEquals([pointObj velocityX], 0.0, @"VelocityX is %f. Should be 0.0", [pointObj velocityX]);
00251         STAssertEquals([pointObj velocityY], 0.0, @"VelocityY is %f. Should be 0.0", [pointObj velocityY]);
00252         STAssertEquals([pointObj velocityZ], 0.0, @"VelocityZ is %f. Should be 0.0", [pointObj velocityZ]);
00253         
00254         [pointObj updateVelocityX: velocityX velocityY: velocityY velocityZ: velocityZ];
00255         STAssertEquals([pointObj velocityX], velocityX, @"VelocityX is %f. Should be %f", [pointObj velocityX], velocityX);
00256         STAssertEquals([pointObj velocityY], velocityY, @"VelocityY is %f. Should be %f", [pointObj velocityY], velocityY);
00257         STAssertEquals([pointObj velocityZ], velocityZ, @"VelocityZ is %f. Should be %f", [pointObj velocityZ], velocityZ);
00258 }

00260 - (void)testUpdateAcceleration
00261 {
00262         double accelerationX    = 0.1;
00263         double accelerationY    = -0.5;
00264         double accelerationZ    = -9.81;
00265         
00266         STAssertNotNil(pointObj, @"Point not created");
00267         STAssertEquals([pointObj accelerationX], 0.0, @"AccelerationX is %f. Should be 0.0", [pointObj accelerationX]);
00268         STAssertEquals([pointObj accelerationY], 0.0, @"AccelerationY is %f. Should be 0.0", [pointObj accelerationY]);
00269         STAssertEquals([pointObj accelerationZ], 0.0, @"AccelerationZ is %f. Should be 0.0", [pointObj accelerationZ]);
00270         
00271         [pointObj updateAccelerationX: accelerationX accelerationY: accelerationY accelerationZ: accelerationZ];
00272         STAssertEquals([pointObj accelerationX], accelerationX, 
00273                                    @"AccelerationX is %f. Should be %f", [pointObj accelerationX], accelerationX);
00274         STAssertEquals([pointObj accelerationY], accelerationY,
00275                                    @"AccelerationY is %f. Should be %f", [pointObj accelerationY], accelerationY);
00276         STAssertEquals([pointObj accelerationZ], accelerationZ,
00277                                    @"AccelerationZ is %f. Should be %f", [pointObj accelerationZ], accelerationZ);
00278 }

00280 - (void)testComputeStateForDeltaTime
00281 {
00282         double positionX                = 10.0;
00283         double positionY                = 10.0;
00284         double positionZ                = 10.0;
00285         double velocityX                = 0.1;
00286         double velocityY                = -0.1;
00287         double velocityZ                = 0.001;
00288         double accelerationX    = 0.01;
00289         double accelerationY    = 0.01;
00290         double accelerationZ    = -9.81;
00291         
00292         STAssertNotNil(pointObj, @"Point not created");
00293         
00294         [pointObj updatePositionX: positionX positionY: positionY positionZ: positionZ];
00295         STAssertEquals([pointObj positionX], positionX,
00296                                    @"PositionX is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj positionX], positionX);
00297         STAssertEquals([pointObj positionY], positionY,
00298                                    @"PositionY is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj positionY], positionY);
00299         STAssertEquals([pointObj positionZ], positionZ,
00300                                    @"PositionZ is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj positionZ], positionZ);
00301         
00302         [pointObj updateVelocityX: velocityX velocityY: velocityY velocityZ: velocityZ];
00303         STAssertEquals([pointObj velocityX], velocityX,
00304                                    @"VelocityX is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj velocityX], velocityX);
00305         STAssertEquals([pointObj velocityY], velocityY,
00306                                    @"VelocityY is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj velocityY], velocityY);
00307         STAssertEquals([pointObj velocityZ], velocityZ,
00308                                    @"VelocityZ is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj velocityZ], velocityZ);
00309         
00310         [pointObj updateAccelerationX: accelerationX 
00311                                         accelerationY: accelerationY
00312                                         accelerationZ: accelerationZ];
00313         STAssertEquals([pointObj accelerationX], accelerationX,
00314                                    @"AccelerationX is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj accelerationX], accelerationX);
00315         STAssertEquals([pointObj accelerationY], accelerationY,
00316                                    @"AccelerationY is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj accelerationY], accelerationY);
00317         STAssertEquals([pointObj accelerationZ], accelerationZ,
00318                                    @"AccelerationZ is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj accelerationZ], accelerationZ);
00319         
00320         NSTimeInterval deltaTime = 0.1;
00321         [pointObj computeStateForDeltaTime: deltaTime];
00322         double  pos = positionX + (velocityX * deltaTime) + (accelerationX * deltaTime * deltaTime) / 2.0;
00323         double  vel = velocityX + (accelerationX * deltaTime);
00324         STAssertEquals([pointObj positionX], pos,
00325                                    @"PositionX is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj positionX], pos);
00326         STAssertEquals([pointObj velocityX], vel,
00327                                    @"VelocityX is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj velocityX], vel);
00328         
00329         pos     = positionY + (velocityY * deltaTime) + (accelerationY * deltaTime * deltaTime) / 2.0;
00330         vel     = velocityY + (accelerationY * deltaTime);
00331         STAssertEquals([pointObj positionY], pos,
00332                                    @"PositionY is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj positionY], pos);
00333         STAssertEquals([pointObj velocityY], vel,
00334                                    @"VelocityY is %F. Should be %f.", [pointObj velocityY], vel);
00335         
00336         pos = positionZ + (velocityZ * deltaTime) + (accelerationZ * deltaTime * deltaTime) / 2.0;
00337         vel = velocityZ + (accelerationZ * deltaTime);
00338         STAssertEquals([pointObj positionZ], pos,
00339                                    @"PositionZ is %f. Should be %f.", [pointObj positionZ], pos);
00340         STAssertEquals([pointObj velocityZ], vel,
00341                                    @"VelocityZ is %F. Should be %f.", [pointObj velocityZ], vel);
00342 }
